OUTLINE : Patients undergo preoperative endoscopy injection technetium Tc 99m sulfur colloid around tumor follow celiotomy intraabdominal exploration . At 30 minute follow injection , patient undergo lymphatic mapping gamma probe biopsy sentinel lymph node ( ) . Following biopsy mapping , patient undergo resection primary tumor .
